message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you, and this is a very competitive price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value. While I'm aiming for a higher price, I could meet you halfway. How about $17,000?
Thank you for your proposal, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I am still unable to go beyond $10,000 for this product. I hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
